name: statsd

statsd/port.description: Listening port for statsd. Destination for sending events.

statsd/graphite_port.description: Listening port for graphite. Statsd will forward events to this port

statsd/graphite_host.description: Host address for graphite. Statsd will forward events to this host.

maintainer: Initial owner: Jon Wood. Further enhancements: Patrick McFadin
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Installs and configures Statsd (http://github.com/etsy/statsd)

= REQUIREMENTS:

Ubuntu 11.04 (Natty)

= ATTRIBUTES:

= USAGE:

= CAVEATS:

recipes.statsd::default: Installs statsd for use with graphite
